title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Competencies: Blended Learning Program for Strengthening Heart Failure Patient Management Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and comprehension of human physiology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three symptom management strategies for heart failure patients
Learners can develop patient care plans by applying evidence-based pharmacological treatment protocols
Learners can create and present PBL team-specific preventive education materials to reduce hospitalization rates

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
